thread.title: Police: Mom charged after Brownington toddler found in only a di
thread.title_full: Police: Mom charged after Brownington toddler found in only a di - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Police: Mom charged after Brownington toddler found in only a di
text:
BROWNINGTON, Vt. - State Police say a toddler was found wandering around Brownington with nothing but a diaper on.
Now, a mom is facing child endangerment charges. Good Samaritans brought the child to the town clerk and called police. Troopers say, 28-year-old Mica Collier was at her home and told them she did not realize the 2-year-old was missing. It was only 30 degrees outside, but police say the child was checked out at the hospital and is doing fine. The Department for Children and Families is now investigating.
